text: mokada api apima swayan wiwechanayan walata yanawa.

mehi salakillata gatha yuthu wadagathma karuna wanne galagoda aththe gnyanasara krikat kridakayinta kunu biththara gasana bawata ,enam sharirikawa hinsa karana bawata kara athi tharjanaye nithimaya paththayi.
aluth yamak siduwana awasthawe di janatha dayakathwaya ganimata mahajana sambandhatha wada piliwelak ratata awashyaya.
ee wagema ee hariye ali witharak nemeyi kulu harak ehemath innawa kiyala gune ayiyala kiwwa.
basnahira palath buddhi kottasaye niladharinta lada thorathurak matha mema watalima sidukara sakakaruwan thidenek polis athadanguwata gena atha.

ema budu owadana sihipath karamin bauddhayin lesa apa dan kala yuthu wanne daranagama kusaladhamma himipanan wahanse balaporoththu wu ee uthum dahami samajayaka samajikayan wima ha ewan samajayak nirmanaya kirima sandaha shakthi pramanayen kapa wima ya.
eyata pera thuwakkukaru asala wu aapana shalawakata wedi praharayak ella kara athi athara ema awasthawe thawath jiwitha winashayak siduwa atha.
tikak ra weddi ammatath nidimathayi, eeth anu nidaganna patak na.
namuth ohu adhishtana karagannawa thamata puthek ipadunahama ee hinaya saba karagena puthawa rate prasiddha mallawa pora shurayek karanawa kiyala.
hetheme ee shilasampaththiyen thaman huwa no dakwa yi.

rate thawa thanaka siddhiyak wenakan witharayi eeta passe oya ayiyala akkala okkoma ethanata duwanawa.

ee kohoma wethath, me gamanedi mageth ekka hitiya hamotamath, karadara welawe hoyala balapu podi kumarihami akkatath, kanchana, ashan, nipuna ayiya, gehan ayiya, thurya ayiya athulu ki noki hamotamath mama godak sthuthiwantha wenawa..

'gamperaliya' wadasatahana sandaha pathkarana adhikshana manthriwarunta hath dedenakugen yuth karya mandalayak, karyalayak, wahanayak, sima rahitha indhana dimanawak, durakathana dekak saha masika dimanawak labadima sandaha mema yojanawa idiripath kara thibini.
sangithaya kage da?mata nam hithenne hindusthani thanuwak bawayi.
kotinma kiyanawa nam pakisthane wunath dala yanna puluwan.
namalgen miladi gath rathaya mudaharinnayi niyogayak.
ee nisa ee hejamonika pidaka rajaya ara aragala sambandha karayi.
